name: BSG Clearing
overview: BSG Clearing Solutions GmbH provides clearing, settlement, payment, and financial risk management solutions for voice, data, and Internet protocol communications companies. It offers clearing and settlement services, such as financial, interconnect, LEC, mobile roaming, and WLAN roaming clearing, as well as payphone compensation; and payment processing services, including credit card, direct billing, online payment solutions, mobile payments, and revenue recovery. The company also provides risk management services, such as transaction risk management, identity authentication, and third party verification; and messaging solutions, including two way messaging. BSG Clearing Solutions GmbH was formerly known as EDS Interoperator Services GmbH and changed its name to BSG Clearing Solutions GmbH in 2005. The company is based in Ruesselsheim, Germany. As of August 15, 2005, BSG Clearing Solutions GmbH operates as a subsidiary of Billing Services Group Limited (AIM:BILL).
